text: Steely Dan has nine studio albums, two live albums, twenty-one singles, seven compilation albums, one CD set, and one box set. The band has sold more than forty million albums. == Albums == Studio albums Year Album Certifications 1972 Can't Buy A Thrill * RIAA: Platinum * BPI: Silver 1973 Countdown To Ecstasy * RIAA: Gold 1974 Pretzel Logic * RIAA: Platinum * BPI: Silver 1975 Katy Lied * RIAA: Platinum * BPI: Silver 1976 The Royal Scam * RIAA: Platinum 1977 Aja * RIAA: Platinum * BPI: Silver 1980 Gaucho * RIAA: Platinum 2000 Two Against Nature * RIAA: Platinum * BPI: Silver 2003 Everything Must Go Live albums and videos Year Album 1995 Alive in America 1999 Aja 2000 Plush TV Jazz-Rock Party 2003 Everything Must Go 2021 Northeast Corridor: Steely Dan Live! Compilations Year Album Certifications 1978 Greatest Hits * RIAA: Platinum Steely Dan 1982 Gold * RIAA: Gold 1985 A Decade of Steely Dan * RIAA: Gold * BPI: Silver The Very Best of Steely Dan: Reelin' in the Years * BPI: Gold 1993 Remastered: The Best of Steely Dan - Then and Now Citizen Steely Dan * RIAA: Gold 2000 Showbiz Kids: The Steely Dan Story: 1972-1980 2006 Steely Dan: The Definitive Collection 2007 20th Century Masters - The Millennium Collection: The Best of Steely Dan == Singles == Year Single Album 1972 Dallas Do It Again Can't Buy A Thrill 1973 Reelin' In the Years Show Biz Kids Countdown To Ecstasy My Old School 1974 Rikki Don't Lose That Number Pretzel Logic Pretzel Logic 1975 Black Friday Katy Lied Bad Sneakers 1976 Kid Charlemagne The Royal Scam The Fez Haitian Divorce 1977 Peg Aja 1978 Deacon Blues Josie FM (No Static at All) FM 1980 Hey Nineteen Gaucho 1981 Time Out of Mind 1999 Cousin Dupree Two Against Nature 2000 Jack of Speed Everything Must Go Janie Runaway == References == Category:Discographies of American artists discography
